COUCHBASE_CLSTR_RAM_QUOTA_TOTAL.description: Total quota of memory allocated by the Couchbase cluster.

COUCHBASE_CLSTR_RAM_QUOTA_USED.description: Amount of memory used by Couchbase Cluster from the allocated quota.

COUCHBASE_CLSTR_HDD_QUOTA_TOTAL.description: Total quota of Hard Disk allocated by the Couchbase cluster.

COUCHBASE_CLSTR_HDD_USED.description: Amount of Hard Disk used by Couchbase Cluster from the allocated quota.

COUCHBASE_CLSTR_NODE_COUNT.description: Number of total nodes in a Couchbase cluster.

COUCHBASE_CLSTR_BUCKET_COUNT.description: Number of total buckets in a Couchbase cluster.

COUCHBASE_NODE_CPU_USAGE_RATE.description: CPU utilization percent of a node.

COUCHBASE_NODE_RAM_SYSTEM_TOTAL.description: Total amount of memory on this node as reported by Couchbase.
COUCHBASE_NODE_RAM_SYSTEM_TOTAL.displayName: Couchbase Node Total RAM on System

COUCHBASE_NODE_RAM_SYSTEM_FREE.description: Amount of memory free on this node as reported by Couchbase.
COUCHBASE_NODE_RAM_SYSTEM_FREE.displayName: Couchbase Node Available RAM on System

COUCHBASE_NODE_SWAP_TOTAL.description: Total swap space on this node as reported by Couchbase.
COUCHBASE_NODE_SWAP_TOTAL.displayName: Couchbase Node Available Swap on System

COUCHBASE_NODE_SWAP_USED.description: Used swap space used on this node as reported by Couchbase.

COUCHBASE_NODE_OPERATIONS.description: Number of currently on-going operations on this node.

COUCHBASE_NODE_DOCUMENTS_COUNT.description: Number of documents stored on this node.

COUCHBASE_NODE_DOCUMENTS_SIZE.description: Size of the data in the documents stored on this node.

COUCHBASE_NODE_DOCUMENTS_SIZE_ON_DISK.description: Size on disk of the documents stored on this node.

COUCHBASE_NODE_VIEWS_SIZE.description: Size of the data in the indexed views on this node.

COUCHBASE_NODE_VIEWS_SIZE_ON_DISK.description: Size on disk of the indexed views on this node.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_DOC_FRAGMENTATION.description: Rate of fragmentation of document data in this bucket.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_VIEWS_FRAGMENTATION.description: Rate of fragmentation of views data (i.e. indexes).

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_VIEWS_OPERATIONS.description: Number of currently on-going views-related operations on this node (e.g. queries).

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_DISK_COMMIT_TIME.description: Average time for disk commit operations for this bucket.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_DISK_UPDATE_TIME.description: Average time for disk update operations for this bucket.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_DISK_FETCHES.description: Number of times Couchbase went to disk to get data (non-resident data) per second.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_EVICTIONS.description: Number of times Couchbase evicted data from the resident memory to free-up space.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_MISSES.description: Number of operations on missing documents.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_XDCR_OPERATIONS.description: Cross-datacenter replication operations for this bucket.

COUCHBASE_BUCKET_REPL_CHANGES_LEFT.description: Number of replication operations queued and yet to be performed.
